DOC.brief_summary: This study aim characterize nature impulsivity Parkinson 's Disease ( PD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impulsivity Parkinson 's Disease : Neuropsychology With Magnetic Resonance Imaging Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Early onset PD patient late onset PD patient sibling available PD patient without impulse control disorder Current past treatment dopamine agonists levodopa PD patient without dementia Age < 80 an Exclusion criterion : Early onset PD patient late onset PD patient without sibling available PD patient dementia Age > 80 year
